Texts.Chs:
来自遥远的幻想世界的兔耳种族。
她们是熟练的击剑手，弓箭手和施法者。
（注：维艾拉，虚构种族，来自《最终幻想》）

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:

^orange;增益^reset;:
能量值上限^green;+20^reset;%，移动速度^green;+12^reset;%
抗性：射线抗性^green;+30^reset;%
免疫：黏液

^orange;环境^reset;:
雨林，森林，原始森林生态：生命值上限^green;+10^reset;%，能量值上限^green;+10^reset;%，移动速度^green;+19^reset;%

^orange;武器^reset;:
魔杖，法杖：伤害^green;+15^reset;%，能量值上限^green;+15^reset;%
弓：伤害^green;+15^reset;%，能量值上限^green;+15^reset;%
刺剑（单持）：伤害^green;+10^reset;%，防御^green;+1^reset;，暴击几率^green;+2^reset;%，物理抗性^green;+10^reset;%
刺剑，短剑，匕首：伤害^green;+12^reset;%，物理抗性^green;+15^reset;%，每次连击时有^green;5^reset;%的几率释放神秘爆炸

^red;弱点^reset;:
减益：生命值上限^red;-20^reset;%，饱食度上限^red;-20^reset;%
抗性：暗影抗性^red;-30^reset;%
Texts.Eng:
Cosmic-attuned bunny-folk from a distant world of fantasy. Skilled fencers, archers, and spellcasters.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;12^reset;% Speed
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Cosmic
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Slime

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Rainforest, Forest and Primeval biomes: Health x^green;1.1^reset;, Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;19^reset;% Speed

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Wands and Staves: Damage & Energy x^green;1.15^reset;
  Bows: Damage & Energy x^green;1.15^reset;
  Rapier: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1^reset; Defense
  Rapier+Dagger: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance and +^green;5^reset;% Physical Resistance
  Rapier/Shortsword/Dagger: +^green;15^reset;% Physical Resist, Damage x^green;1.12^reset;, has a ^green;5^reset;% chance to shoot mystic blasts during combos.

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Shadow
  Health & Max Food x^red;0.8^reset;
